articles.title: Two Indiana State football players among 3 killed in single-vehicle crash
articles.description: Two freshman Indiana State football players were among the three students killed in a weekend crash. Two other players were also injured in the accident.
articles.content:

articles.title: Loyola Chicago's Sister Jean turns 103, has train stop named for her
articles.description: Sister Jean Dolores Schmidt, the face of Loyola Chicago's men's basketball team, now has her name on the Chicago train station plaza at the school's campus. The renaming was in honor of the nun's 103rd birthday.
